Reviews.Title: Best looking phone ever
Reviews.Author: MacMaster
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my self then gave it to my mom since it doesnt work on gsm 850 , and where I am thats the only network AT&T; works on, but it is a gorgeous phone, buy it if you have tmobile

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Tri-band cell phone compatible with GSM 900/1800/1900, UMTS 900/2100  plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
5 MP camera with Video Recording; MP3; Bluetooth; Slot for Micro SD Card up to 16GB; FM Radio; Built-In Game; Widget Hotkeys and Side Touch Control.
SMS / EMS / MMS; E Mail; Predictive Text Input (T9); Clear Memo Capture with TextScan; screen has a resolution of 240 pixels by 320 pixels and 262 thousand colours can be viewed.
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 450 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG BL20 Chocolate Unlocked Cell Phone with 5 MP Camera,  Bluetooth , FM Radio, E-mail and MicroSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black)
